name: Tricky Maze: labyrinth escape, puzzle mazes
name_original: Tricky Maze: labyrinth escape, puzzle mazes
description:
Tricky Maze is an improved classic labyrinth game. Solve the puzzle and find the right path using your brain & logic with a limited number of moves.

CHALLENGE YOURSELF
Start with simple levels that can be completed in a few swipes and move to the harder ones with more than ten swipes. This slide puzzle was created for people who want to train their brain and relax at the same time. Forget about boring labyrinth escape and roller splat games! Try a new and challenging sliding game offline

ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
- Simple navigation: swipe up, down, left or right to move the cube to the exit;
- No moves left? Use the restart button to start over;
- Take a hint to show the map if you can't find the way to escape or you are lost;
- You can always skip a labyrinth, but keep in mind that the next one can be even more difficult;
- There is no time limit, so no rush. Think one step ahead before every swipe;
- All levels are handmade, not randomized;
- This free and offline puzzle game includes dozens of levels.
- More challenging levels soon!

PLAY OFFLINE
No Wi-Fi? No problem! Play the maze puzzle game anytime without an internet connection.

STYLISH AND MINIMAL
- Dark color scheme and minimal design provide an incredible user experience;
- Calm and mesmerizing music will help you immerse yourself in the exciting atmosphere of the game;
- A small puzzle game that can be downloaded by any device!
- Supports all tablet devices!

We'd love to get your feedback about our puzzle game. To let us know about any problems & suggestions, feel free to send us an email at support@playrea.com.

Are you up for the slide puzzle challenge? How far can you go without hints? Download and become a maze king!
